text: Mestský Basketbalový Klub Komárno, also known as Rieker Komárno for sponsorship reasons, is a Slovak professional basketball team based in Komárno.Page at Eurobasket.com The team currently plays in the Slovak Extraliga. ==History== In 2012, Rieker made its first Extraliga Finals appearance, but lost 1–3 to Prievidza. In 2013, Rieker lost 3–4 to Inter Bratislava in the Finals. In the 2014–15 season, the franchise got its first national title. Rieker beat Prievidza 4–3 in the Finals. ==Trophies== *Slovak Extraliga :Champions (1): 2014–15 *Slovak Cup :Winners (1): 2012–13 *Alpe Adria Cup: ::Winners (1): 2016–17 ==Season by season== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" |- !
